Body: Description: We recently using DPI Blocking URL to block MS OneDrive upload events for personal account and only allow upload to the company's account. Can we do the same for MS Teams?

What We've Learned Updated: 4/25/2025
- Customer wants to know if he can use DPI blocking with URL for blocking MS teams activities for personal accounts

- Sent email stating that this is not possible currently
Next Steps Updated: Awaiting customer's response

What We've Learned Updated: 5/1/2025

- Customer seeking clarification that there’s no way to blocking selectively to MS Teams account. What if they setup DPI URL blocking to MS OneDrive, will the file still be saved to user’s OneDrive when they share the files through MS Teams?

4/25/2025
- Customer wants to know if he can use DPI blocking with URL for blocking MS teams activities for personal accounts

- Sent email stating that this is not possible currently
Next Steps Updated: Testing conditions and will report back to customer

- Sent customer follow up email
